name: Pixel Pop - Merge Block Town
description:
This is a simple and addictive block puzzle game that will test your mind with many different level difficulty. You just drag and drop different color shapes and try to fit them all in the grid. The grids and shapes changes as you progress trough the levels.


HOW TO PLAY

Just drag and drop the color hexagons and try to fit them all in the grid.


GAME FEATURES

* Smooth and user friendly controls
* Addictive and smooth gameplay
* Quick and easy to learn
* More than 200+ free levels


Download it today for FREE and play it with your friends to see who is the real puzzle master. Have fun while playing and enjoy!
